attributes.review: I thought our first ✨orange✨ president was going to have some game changer ideas that he’s presented over the years through this app. He’s a complete scam and I say that w/ an Irish accent. Seeing that he’s taking down tiktok I thought he wanted us to transition into this app and the only entertaining thing about this app is the reviews😤
attributes.title: I am disappointed😔

attributes.review: Oh no this app is the worst app I’ve ever gotten it is so racially missed up. It has too many Cheeto ads. It makes my phone crash. It steals my location and information that I put in. Worst app ever. It also said I was getting 20,000,000 bucks and I’m not getting it, it Had stolen money instead of giving. The app has too much orange and hay🤦🏽‍♀️
attributes.title: GZ

attributes.review:
This app was so bad — I was all ready to read the complicated policy information on the platform of the Cheeto in Chief, but this app requires me to give away my phone number and as soon as I opened it I was greeted with a picture of an Oompa Loompa holding up his fist!

This is not the way to treat a red-blooded American. I mean, you could have at least tried.
attributes.title: Terrible App

attributes.review: I was so disappointed with this app when I opened it! I completely forgot that we as a whole country are downloading an app to see a Cheeto try and run for president again! After somehow being elected the first time! And he even holds up a ✊🏻 as if he believes in equality. Buddy this just ain’t the app. Go download Tik Tok for a better experience.
attributes.title: BY FAR THE WORST

attributes.review: He is no allowed to take TikTok away so Gen Z better get rid of this one 🤩 also he has to under stand who’s boss
attributes.title: This app has to ✨GO✨

attributes.review: It made my screen look orange. I would honestly rate this app a 0 star review but unfortunately I can’t. It takes up almost all the space up of my storage. What a shame. Anyways, I receive a lot of spam calls bc they ask for my phone number. I just hope everyone a blessed day.
attributes.title: Disappointed

attributes.review: i downloaded this app to see the goals of our lovely president. when downloaded, my phone continuously crashed. as soon as i try to open to the app, donald j trump’s nude photos of his little shrimpy are displayed across the screen. very scarring and disgusting. i feel sorry for anyone who downloads this app and has to see that little orange thing.
attributes.title: DISGUSTING

attributes.review: This app is absolutely awful. I went on it to see what it’s all about and as soon as I opened the app, I contracted corona virus! No one should use this app as it is a carrier for COVID-19. but that’s not all... A tornado flew out of my phone and RUINED my house and killed my family. I would love to be payed compensation for these detrimental damages to my life. Never use this app!
attributes.title: no❤️ but nice try✨🧚🏼‍♀️

attributes.review: i wanted to learn more about the cheeto man so i decided to get this app. unfortunately, immediately after i downloaded it some strange man who resembled that cheeto came running into my house. he ate my hamster and jumped out of my back window after punching my grandma. he then ran onto my front yard and started break dancing while singing various micheal jackson songs. i asked him why he ate my hamster and he responded by moonwalking to his golf cart. he then preceded to run over me with it repeatedly while screaming “maga” at the top of his lungs. afterwords he drove away and crashed into a tree. do not download!!
attributes.title: fat cheeto ate my hamster

attributes.review: I study propaganda and this b.s. app is full of pro-Trump propaganda. Made it easy for his supporters to find skewed info and hateful rhetoric. Definitely deserves to be taken off the App Store as it has become a breeding ground for alt-right, white supremacist groups. Irresponsible to continue allowing those kinds of groups a space to fester their hate and violence.
attributes.title: Historian here - this app is trash
